segments.text: Oh, look at those clever kids sneaking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on that stool, stretching so high to grab them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently with her hand out, so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're having a little adventure right under mom's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is busy drying dishes, polishing that plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes the garden look so inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the curtains are tied back nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is a funny surprise, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's puddling on the floor, but no one's slipping yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those stacked dishes on the counter look ready for more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a joyful, chaotic family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full; plenty for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they save some for later.
segments.speaker: PAR
